name: Escape From Santaland
description:
Escape From Santaland by Jason Ermer

Ugh. Christmastime at the mall. The last place you want to be, during the worst time of year to be there. All your shopping is done (mercifully!) and now, gifts in hand, all that remains is to get to your car. What could go wrong?

Escape From Santaland earned 4th place in the 17th Annual Interactive Fiction Competition (2011).
